April 28, 2013 D SCABA Spring Contest (Third Section)
SCABA Spring Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Spring Contest scaba-spring-contest-third-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Best Instrumentalist - Richard Gibbons - Sussex Brass (Hastings) 3 Best Horn Section - Sussex Brass (Hastings) 3 Best Solo Cornet Section – Brighton & Hove City Brass 7 Conductor’s prize - Matthew Hackett – Brighton & Hove City Brass 7 Best March - Pangbourne (Stewart Lewins) 1
April 28, 2013, 2:18 p.m. May 19, 2014, 9:33 a.m.
1 Brighton and Hove City Brass Matthew Hackett Divertimento [Barry]
2 Sussex Brass (Hastings) Steve Hollamby Promenade
3 Pangbourne & District Silver Band Stewart Lewins Divertimento [Barry]
4 Patcham Silver James Benka-Coker Scheherazade
5 Mole Valley Silver Andy Wilson
